text: Hudee pala ang gi dahi ada mee be e daumaha gi di maa, idimaa, Au go Yihowah go di godou God, Au go di God dubua. Digau ala ma ga ginagina i di Au, gei Au ga hagaduadua digaula mo nadau hagadili gi muli, gaa dae loo gi di tolu mo di haa adu dangada.5.9 Exodus 34.6-7; Numbers 14.18; Deuteronomy 7.9-10
